Terms & Conditions

1. Payment & Inclusions

  • Payment covers only visiting/participation charges.
  • Food, travel, accommodation, and other personal expenses are{" "} not included.

2. Booking & Confirmation

  • Bookings are confirmed only after successful payment through Razorpay.
  • Provisional or unpaid bookings are not considered confirmed.

3. Additional Costs

Any costs beyond participation charges (such as travel, lodging, meals, or other services) shall be borne directly by the customer.

4. Payment Security

  • All payments are processed securely via Razorpay.
  • Franmax India does not store or have access to your card or banking details.

5. Dispute Resolution

For concerns or disputes, contact us at{" "} events@franmaxindia.com {" "} or{" "} +91 94038 90794 .

6. Amendments to Terms

Franmax India may update or modify these Terms & Conditions at any time without prior notice. Participants are advised to review the terms periodically for updates.

Last updated: {new Date().toLocaleDateString()}

); }
